headline: A pair of Senate Democrats want to suspend the federal gas tax through the end of 2022
author: Joseph Zeballos-Roig
sentences: Inflation has hit a four-decade high in recent months, the product of snarled supply chains and persistent labor shortages helping to push up prices for groceries, housing, and most other goods and services.
